間ずっと: (あいだずっと) - throughout; all through; right through
間に: (あいだに) - while; during (the time when)
間にあう: (まにあう) - to be in time for; to serve (suit, meet) the purpose/to be good enough/to be enough
間に合う: (まにあう) - to be in time for; to serve (suit, meet) the purpose/to be good enough/to be enough
間に合っている: (まにあっている) - to already have enough (phrase often used in turning down an offer)/to already have what one needs; to be on time
間に合わす: (まにあわす) - to make something be done in time
間に合わせる: (まにあわせる) - to make do/to manage (with something)/to make shift; to (make) get done on time
間に立つ: (あいだにたつ) - to mediate; to intervene
間の子: (あいのこ) - person of mixed parentage; crossbreed; Eurasian; mulatto; hybrid
間の子船: (あいのこぶね) - semi-Western, semi-Japanese wooden sailing boat, popular during the latter half of the Meiji period and the Taisho period
間の宿: (あいのしゅく) - resting place between inn towns (Edo period); town situated between two post towns
間の戸: (あいのと) - door between the rooms
間の楔: (あいのくさび) - wedge (for securing objects together); tie/bond
間の狂言: (あいのきょうげん) - kyogen interlude; short scene during a noh play, performed by a kyogen actor (usu. explaining the play)
間の間: (あいのま) - room connecting the two main rooms of a building; intermediate room
間びき: (まびき) - thinning out/pruning/culling/sub-sampling (e.g. video frames, signals); infanticide
間もないころ: (まもないころ) - in the early period (of something); at the beginning
間もなく: (まもなく) - soon/before long/in a short time; (after verb) lacking time to .../without time to ...
間も無いころ: (まもないころ) - in the early period (of something); at the beginning
間も無く: (まもなく) - soon/before long/in a short time; (after verb) lacking time to .../without time to ...
間を取る: (あいだをとる) - to take the middle (between the two); to split the difference
間を持つ: (まをもつ) - to have a controlling presence; to have a certain aura
間を空ける: (あいだをあける) - to leave space (between)
間を置いて: (あいだをおいて) - intermittently; at intervals (of); after a pause
間を置く: (あいだをおく) - to pause; to have a short intermission
間を開ける: (あいだをあける) - to leave space (between)
間一髪のところ: (かんいっぱつのところ) - close call; narrow escape
間一髪を入れず: (かんいっぱつをいれず) - in a flash; in no time
間仕切り: (まじきり) - partition between two rooms; room divider; partition wall
間伐材: (かんばつざい) - timber from forest thinning; thinned wood
間八: (カンパチ) - greater amberjack (Seriola dumerili); purplish amberjack; greater yellowtail
間切: (まぎり) - sailing windward; land division in the Ryukyu Kingdom equivalent to modern prefectures (but the size of cities or towns)
間切り: (まぎり) - sailing windward; land division in the Ryukyu Kingdom equivalent to modern prefectures (but the size of cities or towns)
間切る: (まぎる) - to plow through (a wave) (plough); to tack (against the wind)
間判: (あいばん) - medium-sized paper (approx. 15x21 cm, used for notebooks); medium-sized photo print (approx. 10x13 cm)
間取り: (まどり) - plan of a house; arrangement of rooms; list of rooms in an apartment, excluding bathroom and toilet, encoded as a string of digits and letters (e.g. "2DK" for a two-room apartment with a kitchen-dining area)
間合: (まあい) - interval/distance/break/pause; suitable time/appropriate opportunity; distance between opponents (kendo)
間合い: (まあい) - interval/distance/break/pause; suitable time/appropriate opportunity; distance between opponents (kendo)
間夫: (まぶ) - a married woman's paramour; lover

間尺: (ましゃく) - measuring rope with 'ken' (182cm) marked; measurement
間尺に合わない: (ましゃくにあわない) - does not pay; not worth (one's) while
間引き: (まびき) - thinning out/pruning/culling/sub-sampling (e.g. video frames, signals); infanticide
間引き運転: (まびきうんてん) - curtailed transit schedule
間引く: (まびく) - to thin out; to cull; to run on a curtailed schedule
間抜け面: (まぬけづら) - a foolish or stupid look
間接: (かんせつ) - (ant: 直接・ちょくせつ) indirection; indirectness

間接参照: (かんせつさんしょう) - indirect referencing
